properties.name: St Fagans National Museum of History
Bala Lake Railway
properties.summary: Rheilffordd Llyn Tegid (Bala Lake Railway), a delightful 9-mile return journey alongside Bala Lake, in the beautiful Snowdonia National Park
properties.cy_summary: Rheilffordd Llyn Tegid, taith ddwyffordd 9 milltir ar hyd glannau Llyn Tegid ym Mharc Cenedlaethol Eryri. Bydd pob trên yn dechrau a gorffen yng ngorsaf Llanuwchllyn gyda’i gaffi, siediau locomotif a chanolfan treftadaeth

properties.name: Brecon Mountain Railway
properties.summary: Steam into the Brecon Beacons on a 10-mile round trip from Pant near Merthyr Tydfil to Torpantau high in the Brecon Beacons
properties.cy_summary: Ewch ar drên stem i Fannau Brycheiniog ar gylchdaith 10 milltir o hyd o Bant ger Merthyr Tudful i Dorpantau, yn uchel ym Mannau Brycheiniog

properties.name: Fairbourne Railway
properties.summary: Experience the beauty of the Mawddach Estuary on this miniature, half-sized coastal railway. Connecting the village of Fairbourne with the sea at Barmouth Ferry
properties.cy_summary: Profwch harddwch Moryd y Fawddach ar y rheilffordd miniatur (fechan) hanner maint arfordirol sy’n cysylltu pentref Fairbourne gyda’r môr yn Fferi’r Bermo

properties.name: Ffestiniog Railway
properties.summary: Truly a 'Great Little Railway', Ffestiniog is the oldest independent railway company in the World today
properties.cy_summary: 'Rheilffordd Fach wirioneddol Wych', Ffestiniog yw cwmni rheilffordd annibynnol hynaf y byd

properties.name: Llanberis Lake Railway
properties.summary: The heritage steam locomotives take you on a five-mile return journey alongside beautiful Llyn Padarn lake, in the heart of Snowdonia
properties.cy_summary: Mae’r locomotifau stêm treftadaeth yn mynd â chi ar daith bum milltir ddwyffordd ar hyd glannau hyfryd Llyn Padarn yng nghanol Eryri

properties.name: Snowdon Mountain Railway
properties.summary: To the summit of Snowdon, since 1896. Snowdon Mountain Railway has been described as one of the most unique and wonderful railway journeys in the world
properties.cy_summary: I gopa’r Wyddfa, ers 1896. Disgrifiwyd rheilffordd yr Wyddfa fel taith reilffordd unigryw ac un o’r rhai hyfrytaf yn y byd

properties.name: Talyllyn Railway
properties.summary: Steam through the charming Fathew valley in Snowdonia National Park. Enjoy glorious coastline, ancient woodlands, mountains, waterfalls and a viaduct
properties.cy_summary: Ewch ar stêm drwy ddyffryn hyfryd y Fathew ym Mharc Cenedlaethol Eryri. Mwynhewch arfordir gwych, coetiroedd hynafol, mynyddoedd cwymp dŵr a thraphont

properties.name: Vale of Rheidol Railway
properties.summary: A blast of the whistle and the hiss of steam and you’re away! Sit back and relax on a nostalgic journey through some spectacular scenery
properties.cy_summary: Chwythiad o’r chwiban a hisian y stêm - a ffwrdd a chi! Eisteddwch yn ôl ac ymlaciwch ar daith hiraethus drwy olygfeydd aruthrol

properties.name: Welsh Highland Railway
properties.summary: Taking a trip on the new Welsh Highland Railway has to be one of the most spectacular ways to see the awe-inspiring scenery of the Snowdonia National Park
properties.cy_summary: Mae’n rhaid mai un o’r ffyrdd mwyaf trawiadol i weld golygfeydd i’ch ysbrydoli ym Mharc Cenedlaethol Eryri yw mynd ar daith ar y Rheilffordd Eryri newydd

properties.name: Welsh Highland Heritage Railway
properties.summary: The Welsh Highland Heritage Railway, Porthmadog, is a small railway catering for all ages, in all weathers, and whatever your level of interest, there is something to offer you
properties.cy_summary: Rheilffordd fechan yw Rheilffordd Treftadaeth Eryri sy’n cynnig rhywbeth at ddant pobl o bob oed, ym mhob tywydd, beth bynnag fo’u diddordeb

properties.name: Welshpool & Llanfair Railway
properties.summary: A 16-mile return journey by narrow-gauge steam train through the beautiful Mid-Wales countryside, a wonderful way to watch the world go by
properties.cy_name: Rheilffordd y Trallwng a Llanfair Caereinion
properties.cy_summary: Taith ddwyffordd 16 milltir drwy gefn gwlad hyfryd Canolbarth Cymru ar drên stêm lein gul, ffordd wych o wylio’r byd yn mynd heibio

properties.name: Corris Railway
properties.summary: Take a gentle trip down the beautiful Dulas Valley on this family-friendly steam railway
properties.cy_summary: The preservation of the Corris Railway started in 1966. The volunteers have restored the infrastructure, laid track and built a completely new train with modern recreations of the original Corris Victorian carriages and a Corris steam locomotive
